definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享页面时，您可以将用户指定为查看者或编辑者。

sentences.english: More responsive page rendering using lazy frame construction.
sentences.chinese: 更多的反应型页面渲染使用懒人框架结构。

sentences.english: Use this as a template to enumerate each secure page.
sentences.chinese: 将这作为枚举每个安全页面的模板。

sentences.english: Stars become the official page, the stars become the novel to read.
sentences.chinese: 星辰变官方页面，星辰变小说阅读。

sentences.english: The pages to perform the maintenance should be password protected.
sentences.chinese: 执行维护的页面应该有口令保护。

sentences.english: Once you open a page, it has formatting functions just as in word processor.
sentences.chinese: 每一个新页面都有与文书处理机相同的格式化功能。

sentences.english: Moreover, there are no page-outs getting reported.
sentences.chinese: 另外，没有报告页面换出。

sentences.english: A column break inserted in the last column of a page will act as a page break.
sentences.chinese: 插入到页面最后一列的分栏符会成为分页符。

sentences.english: Also remember that one size does not fit all when optimizing pages.
sentences.chinese: 还要记住，在对页面进行优化时不要千篇一律。

sentences.english: Margins define the outside boundary of your page.
sentences.chinese: 边距决定页面的外部边界。

sentences.english: After optimization your pages will appear to snap onto the screen.
sentences.chinese: 在优化之后，你的页面会快速的呈现在屏幕上。

sentences.english: Master-detail views can be implemented across multiple pages or on individual ones.
sentences.chinese: 这种程式在单一页面或多页切换时都可实现。

sentences.english: Dead link to send a request, the server returns a 404 error page.
sentences.chinese: 死链接发送请求时，服务器返回404错误页面。

sentences.english: I hope that Antti gets his page back running soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望得到他的安蒂页面很快恢复运行。

sentences.english: Try reloading your page and checking it out.
sentences.chinese: 请您也尝试重新加载您的页面并查看结果。

definition: home page (of a website)/title page/front page/first page/fig. beginning/cover letter
